abstract: A study finds that about a third Americans in that top 1 percent are executives, managers and supervisors who work outside of finance.
snippet: A study finds that about a third Americans in that top 1 percent are executives, managers and supervisors who work outside of finance.
lead_paragraph: The "99-percenters" protesting at Occupy Wall Street should think about occupying the C-suites across America as well, at least if their primary complaint is about income inequality.

headline.main: The Top 1%: Executives, Doctors and Bankers
